parameters.name: Base64
parameters.description: Specifies whether the content of the key is Base64-encoded. Set this parameter to true if you want to store the key content in binary format. When this parameter is set to true, the Value parameter must be Base64-encoded.

parameters.name: Expiration
parameters.description: The time when the key-value pair expires, which cannot be earlier than the current time. The value is a timestamp in seconds. If you specify both Expiration and ExpirationTtl, only ExpirationTtl takes effect.

parameters.name: ExpirationTtl
parameters.description: The relative expiration time. Unit: seconds. If you specify both Expiration and ExpirationTtl, only ExpirationTtl takes effect.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The key name. The name can be up to 512 characters in length and cannot contain spaces or backslashes (\\).

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The name of the namespace that you specify when you call the [CreateKvNamespace](~~2850317~~) operation.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: The content of the key, which can be up to 2 MB (2 × 1000 × 1000). If the content is larger than 2 MB, call [PutKvWithHighCapacity](~~2850486~~).
